import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { Navigate, useNavigate} from "react-router-dom"; import axios from 'axios'; import Item from "../Item"; import "../Home/home.css"; function Home(){ //Imports const navigate = useNavigate(); //Use States const [items, setItems] = useState([]); const [userName, setUsername] = useState(""); const [category_filter, setCategory_filter] = useState([]); //Use Effects useEffect(()=>{ const token = localStorage.getItem('token'); axios.get("http://localhost:5000/", { headers : { Authorization: token, }}).then(async (res) =>{ // console.log(res.data); setItems(res.data.items); setUsername(res.data.username); }) .catch((error) => { navigate('/login'); }); },[]); //On Click Functions function logout(){ localStorage.removeItem('token'); navigate('/login'); } async function category_checkbox(event) { if(event.target.checked) { function doit(){ setCategory_filter( (prevArray) => { return [...prevArray, event.target.name]; }); } doit(); } console.log(category_filter); // console.log(event.target.name); // console.log(event.target.checked); } return (
